quotes: John Podesta initially joined the White House in September 2022 as the Senior Advisor to President Biden for Clean Energy Innovation and Implementation (OCEII)
In 2008, he served as co-chair of President Obama’s transition team.
He chaired Hillary Clinton’s campaign for president in 2016.
